name: Blue cat 3D park adventure FUN!!!
description:
Welcome! There is the new park in town and it cooms in diffrent parts! Its up to you to find all the hidden parts! You dont have all day though, becuse you will be late for drinking class!

This game was inspired by Baldi's Basics

None of the music is owned by me,
nintendo or mystman12. If the owners want me to take it down i will. Most music is edited by me.
